name: Falling Water - Drawing with Light
description: 2 Minute 27 Sec film created by passing light over metal and thread and inverted to produce a meditative, mindful artwork. This artwork was originally exhibited at Blinc in the UK in 2012 and has been reconfigured for the platform. The artwork is provided as a digital file. The work is inspired by a recent residency in Iceland and a direct response to the Selfoss Waterfall in the South of the country.
